name: Bread With Chocolate and Olive Oil
recipeIngredient: 6 thick slices country-style bread (about 10 ounces total)
6 ounces bittersweet chocolate (preferably 60 percent cocoa, coarsely grated. A Microplane is not essential, but it helps.)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 325. Put the bread on a baking sheet and bake until golden brown on both sides, 5 to 7 minutes total. Spoon the chocolate over the toast in a thin, even layer. Drizzle the toast with the oil and sprinkle with the salt. Serve.
